page.title: 15TRADE IN NORTHWOLD
page.content: The most important shop is the Post Office which is combined with a general store and off licence.The butcher also has an important role. A craft shop,selling paintings of the local area and handmade puppets and toys,is combined with a small cafe and bed and breakfast business. Other businesses include a cycle repair shed,a small motor garage, several builders,a coal yard and stone merchant and a trading company. Dairy produce,soft drinks,bread and seasonal fayre are delivered to our doors daily except Sundays and Bank Holidays. Ready cooked fish,meat pies and chips can be bought from a purpose built van which visits Northwold 3 times a week. Uncooked fish can also be purchased from a further van once a week.
